body:
Also please be aware that sometimes the command hangs because it's waiting
input from stdin.
Try typing ^D (or ^Z on windows) to see if it's the case.

I tried very hard to reproduce the hang you mentioned, but I can't, and I
don't think gofmt or
goimport could possibly hang due to wrong import comments either. Only
cmd/go checks that.
(I've searched the entire golang.org/x/tools repository and
$GOROOT/src/cmd/gofmt directory
for ImportComment, but find none. This means that those commands don't even
request the
go/build package to scan for import comments)
